Event: Initialize the CPI basket and set a new reference date
We add 4 newly available cars from Stock Center since 7 previous cars were sold
We replace 7 products from Stephanis and 1 product from MotoRace; We enrich 8 subclasses of SupermarketCy that contain only 1 product with more products
The government is abolishing zero VAT on basic consumer goods
The government is bringing back the zero VAT on basic consumer goods until 2025-12-31
Primetel announces special offers on Bundled telecommunication services
Primetel raises the prices of Giga Unlimited plans on Bundled telecommunication services
Primetel announces new homefiber subsidized plans on Internet access provision services

FuelDaddy starts blocking any attempt for scraping due to its new Web application Firewall Settings so we start collecting the average prices of the 5 fuels from the observatory of Consumer Protection Service
European University Cyprus publishes the tuition fees for 2025-2026
We manage to start scraping again FuelDaddy
The price of Toyota Aygo X (new motor cars) drops from 17700 to 16500 euros; We enrich Stock Center by adding two more second-hand motor cars (from 2 to 4 cars)

Because of SupermarketCy changes/updates, we replace about 50 of its goods/products such as fresh/chilled fruits, fresh/chilled vegetables, potatoes, pork, lamb and goat, beef and veal, poultry, other meats, frozen fish, and fresh/chilled fish. Also, we add another three restaurants (Piatsa Gourounaki, Pagkratios, Christos Grill&Seafood) to have prices for meat and fish mezes across all major cities of Cyprus
We replace 15 products in Stephanis because they become non-available
Cyprus Ministry of Education, Sport and Youth publishes the tuition fees of private education for 2025-2026
Athlokinisi announces summer sales on two products in Garments for infants (0 to 2 years) and children (3 to 13 years)
We add Public (73 products) as a new retailer
Electricity Authority Cyprus (AHK) announces new prices for residential usage
Public raises the price of a mobile telephone equipment from 119.9 to 149.9 euros
Cablenet announces new products and prices for Bundled telecommunication services
Public reduces the price of a personal computer from 548 to 399 euros
The price of Toyota Aygo X (New motor cars) raises from 17700 to 20900 euros
We replace Piatsa Gourounaki with Mageirisses restaurant since the scraping of the new menu (meat meze for 2 persons) of the former is not feasible
